metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Gone has complexity on par with the typical song, having near-average scores in Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody and below-average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity and Chord-Melody Tension.
key_conclusion: Gone has sections analyzed in the following keys: E♭ Mixolydian, F♯ Major,  and D♯ Minor.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
